p:
Phosphomolybdenum method to determine the total antioxidant capacity (TAC) of the hydroethanolic extract of E. grandiflorum was used, following the procedure described by Prieto et al.
21 Different concentrations of ascorbic acid were mixed in absolute methanol to make standard solutions (1000, 500, 250, 125, 62.5 and 31.25 Î¼g/mL). The total antioxidant activity is expressed as the number of gram equivalent of ascorbic acid.
